articles.title: Sickly shades of gray: Disease outbreaks influence the color of wolves across North America - Phys.org
articles.description: New research from the University of Oxford, Yellowstone National Park, and Penn State, published today in the journal Science, may have finally solved why wolves change color across the North American continent.
articles.content: If you were to travel from Arctic Canada and head south down the Rocky Mountains into the U.S. toward Mexico, the further south you go, the more black wolves there are. The reasons why have long puzz… [+455 chars]
